programme.title: Nightwatch - Those We Rely On (Season 1, Episode 2)
programme.desc: It's an emotional night on the Nightwatch in New Orleans as one EMS officer tells his partner that this is their last night on the job. Meanwhile, it's a tough night in a different way for the firefighters as the group responds.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Their Worst Day (Season 1, Episode 5)
programme.desc: Police officers Victor and Lejon join a SWAT team operation hunting a homicide suspect. The fire department tries to save a man who fell into the Mississippi River. And for the EMT's, the calls tonight are as much about comforting victims.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Caught You, By Surprise (Season 1, Episode 8)
programme.desc: Police officers pursue suspected drug dealers, while Keeley saves a group of partiers from a violent schizophrenic.

programme.title: Nightwatch - Mardi Gras (Season 2, Episode 1)
programme.desc: It's the week of Mardi Gras, and it's the busiest time of year for our first responders. Working the parade route comes with its own challenges and unique cases.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Catfish and Gators (Season 1, Episode 2)
programme.desc: In Southern Louisiana, alligators are just a part of everyday life. When a vicious alligator attacks a family's dog, Deputy Melissa "Catfish" Quintal must call in the services of her alligator hunter boyfriend.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Bayou Busted (Season 1, Episode 1)
programme.desc: Sheriff Vernon Bourgeois is the most powerful man in town--overseeing the investigation of every strange and eerie occurrence in the region.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Full Moon Madness (Season 1, Episode 4)
programme.desc: The strangest and eeriest calls on the bayou happen at night, especially when a full moon shines overhead. Detective Terry Daigre has been trying to track down a gang of thieves that are preying on empty camps.

programme.title: Cajun Justice - Grave Robbery (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: Aboveground crypts in Terrebonne Parish are just part of the landscape because with frequent flooding, you can't bury bodies in the ground. These tombs are vulnerable to vandalism and theft.

programme.title: Most Daring - Fighting For Your Life (Season 2, Episode 12)
programme.desc: A man will go over the edge of Niagara Falls if rescuers don't save him in time. Plus, a lion tamer must free his brother from a savage attack by one of his charges.

programme.title: Most Daring - Dangerous Duos (Season 5, Episode 2)
programme.desc: Two generations of a crime family rob a bank, then run into the police; men trying to elude the law encounter a roadblock; a store clerk confronts armed juveniles.

programme.title: Most Daring - High Risk Rescues (Season 7, Episode 2)
programme.desc: A base jump gone-wrong leaves a thrill-seeker stuck on a cliff; firefighters rush into a burning house to save a family; a paramedic scrambles to save a teen crushed beneath a school bus.

programme.title: Most Daring - Riots & Rumbles (Season 5, Episode 15)
programme.desc: Fists fly during a lingerie football league match and a dance contest gets vicious when one competitor hogs the stage.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#101) (Season 1, Episode 1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A defendant leaps over a balcony headfirst in a death-defying escape attempt; a man accused of murdering his girlfriend's 4-year old son has an unlikely defender: his girlfriend;

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#102) (Season 1, Episode 2)
programme.desc: A mourning father makes a desperate attempt to attack his daughter's killer; a judge takes off his robe to help subdue an unruly defendant; a defendant tries to sing his way to a lighter sentence; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#103) (Season 1, Episode 3)
programme.desc: A defendant wields an unlikely weapon, and pays the ultimate price; a judge chases down two escaping defendants; a convicted murderer's smile in court could put him in prison for the rest of his life; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam - Court Cam (#104) (Season 1, Episode 4)
programme.desc: A suspected murderer slashes his own throat in court; a foul-mouthed defendant lets loose on the judge; a young woman tries to save the life of the man who is suing her family; and more.

programme.title: Most Daring - Fighting For Your Life (Season 2, Episode 12)
programme.desc: A man will go over the edge of Niagara Falls if rescuers don't save him in time. Plus, a lion tamer must free his brother from a savage attack by one of his charges.
